name: Lux Magna
effects: Physical light damage (2.5x, ATK) to all enemies
Reduce resistance to Dark by 35% for 3 turns to all enemies

desc_short: Light damage and reduce dark resistance for all enemies

Lichtschaden u. Dunkelres. runter, alle Gegner

desc_long: Boosts light resistance and nullifies poison, blind, sleep and confusion.
對全體敵人發動光屬性攻擊並降低其暗屬性耐性的數值。
적 전체에 빛속성 피해를 주고, 어둠속성 저항력을 감소시킵니다.
Inflige des dégâts de lumière et réduit la résistance aux ténèbres de tous les ennemis.
Fügt allen Gegnern Lichtschaden zu und reduziert seine Dunkelresistenz.
Daño de luz y reduce la resistencia a la oscuridad de todos los enemigos
